mapper.sql: id, name, sort, url, parent_id AS parentId
mapper.select: SELECT ap.id as id, ap.`name` as name, ap.sort as sort, ap.url as url, ap.parent_id AS parentId FROM role_permission rp LEFT JOIN admin_permission ap ON ap.id = rp.permission_id WHERE ap.parent_id = #{parentId} order by ap.id
SELECT ap.id as id, ap.`name` as name, ap.sort as sort, ap.url as url, ap.parent_id AS parentId FROM admin_permission ap WHERE ap.id = #{id} order by ap.sort
SELECT T1.id as id, T1.`name` as name, T1.parent_id as parentId FROM admin_permission T1

SELECT T3.id as id, T3.`name` as name, T3.parent_id as parentId FROM admin_role T1 LEFT JOIN role_permission T2 ON T2.role_id = T1.role_id LEFT JOIN admin_permission T3 ON T3.id = T2.permission_id WHERE T1.role_id =#{roleId}
SELECT T1.id as id, T1.`name` as name, T1.sort as sort, T1.url as url, T1.parent_id as parentId FROM admin_permission T1 WHERE T1.id = #{id}
